answers.author: Sarah Saunders
answers.text:
Hi Charlotte, I am also interested in this topic. The City of Fort Lauderdale is looking for innovative ways that we can improve landscaping and beautification on our medians and major corridors, all while doing more with less. I have had a few meetigns with our landscape/maintenance team within our Parks and Recreation Department and have done some preliminary research on how other municipalities approach maintenance levels. I have not been able to find a great deal but I'm happy to share what I have found (mostly rating scales and how maintenance levels are prioritized). I would appreciate if you could share with me anything you come across as well.
